value.description: The objective of this project was to design a scalable, data-driven bidlist optimization algorithm for real-time bidding (RTB) on The Trade Desk (TTD) platform...

keyFeatures.title: Real-time Optimization
keyFeatures.description: Dynamic bid adjustment based on real-time performance metrics

keyFeatures.title: Machine Learning Pipeline
keyFeatures.description: Automated feature engineering and model retraining

keyFeatures.title: Scalable Architecture
keyFeatures.description: Handles millions of bid requests per second

value.problem: Traditional bidding systems lack real-time optimization capabilities, leading to inefficient ad spend and suboptimal campaign performance.
value.solution: Developed an ML-powered system that dynamically adjusts bids based on real-time performance data and historical patterns.

images.caption: Real-time bidding dashboard showing key metrics

videos.caption: Demo of the real-time bidding process
